name: Sling Rush
description:
This game was made in just 3 hours!  Use your mouse to slingshot the ball through the track and into the finish!  All music and art was done in 3 hours.  One final challenge was a Nokia pallet and resolution.  Hope you have fun playing.

My Record: 25.554

Game Engine:  Godot

Music: LMMS

Font: Nice Font and Thank You for It

Sound FX: Chiptone

Art: Piskel
